ContractType
The contract type enumeration.
ContractTypeConverter
The ContractTypeConverter class is a converter class that converts the ContractType enum to a string and vice versa.
ContractTypeSubset
The ContractTypeSubset interface is a constraint annotation that validates that the contract type is any of the specified contract types.
ContractTypeSubsetValidator
The ContractTypeSubsetValidator class is a validator class that validates the ContractType enum.

The ControllerExceptionHandler class is a global exception handler that catches exceptions thrown by controllers.

FutureDateConstraint
The FutureDateConstraint interface is a constraint annotation that validates that the date is at least 7 days in the future.
FutureDateConstraintValidator
The FutureDateConstraintValidator class is a validator class that validates the date to be in the future.
IncompleteDataException
The IncompleteDataException class is a custom exception that is thrown when a required field is missing from a request.

This class represents a login request.
LogoSizeConstraint
The LogoSizeConstraint interface is a constraint annotation that validates that the logo size is less than or equal to 1MB.
LogoSizeValidator
The LogoSizeValidator class is a validator class that validates the size of the company logo.

The Messages class is a constant class that holds the error messages.

This class represents a service for managing technologies in the job board application.

The ThreadIdConverter class is a custom converter for logback that converts the thread ID of the logging event into a string.

Exception thrown when a user already exists.

Exception thrown when a user is not found.
UserRepository
The UserRepository interface provides methods for interacting with the users in the database.
UserService
The UserService class is responsible for handling user-related operations such as user registration, login, and retrieving user details.
